module.name: SMS
module.description: This module is used to configure and manage SMS chat interfaces inside of the new UCP.
module.changelog: *13.0.9* Support more file formats during upload *13.0.8* Remove full text searching on the database *13.0.7* Support for MMS Services *13.0.6* Remove en_US Translations *13.0.5* FREEPBX-11098 use bootstrap tables, fix formatting and display *13.0.4* Fix did array issue breaking sending *13.0.3* FREEPBX-11095 *13.0.2.1* Fix database name typo *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha1* Remove DEFAULT charset from module install
